He Honore

CHe hōnore, he ko-Am-rōria Mau-F-ngārongo G ki te whe-C-nua Wha-C-ka-aro Am pai e Ki F ngā tanga-G-ta kato-C-a Ake G a-a-Am-ke, ake G a-a-Am-ke F Ā-ā-ā-mi-G-ne Te A-G-tu-u-Am-a, te pi-G-ri-i-Am-nga, F Toku G ora-C-nga

He hōnore, he korōria1 Maungārongo ki te whenua Whakaaro2 pai e Kingā tangata katoa Ake ake, ake ake Āmine Te Atua, te piringa, Toku oranga
